lead_paragraph: GOLDSMITH--Barbara Lubin. The Board of Managers of the East Hampton Library mourns the passing of Barbara Lubin Goldsmith to whom all libraries and lovers of books are indebted: for making certain that all books are printed on acid-free paper, for fighting for the liberation of imprisoned writers worldwide, and for her own gifts to literature. We are grateful for having had her imprimatur as a Founding Honorary Co-Chair of our annual Authors Night literary event for the past 12 years, as she urged us to always maintain the highest standards. Her encouraging presence will be greatly missed and her memory honored. Sheila Rogers, President of the Board of Managers 1/3
